== Project Structure Overview ==

=== Core Components ===
* **Frontend**: Next.js 14 web application
* **Mobile Apps**: Flutter applications for monitoring and analytics
* **Backend Services**: Python FastAPI services, Rust blockchain node
* **Infrastructure**: Docker, Kubernetes, cloud providers
* **Databases**: PostgreSQL, ClickHouse, Redis
* **Monitoring**: Prometheus, Grafana, custom dashboards

=== Infrastructure Pools ===
* **Infrastructure Pool**: Google Cloud Platform (Ethereum nodes)
* **Analytics Pool**: Hetzner Cloud (APIs, databases)
* **ML Pool**: TBD (Machine learning infrastructure)

=== Key Services ===
* **Analytics API**: FastAPI service for data queries and aggregations
* **AI/ML Service**: Python service for predictions and risk assessment
* **Blockchain Node**: Rust service for blockchain operations
* **Data Ingestion**: Python service for data collection
* **Stream Processing**: Real-time data processing
* **Admin Dashboard**: Node.js administrative interface

== Quick Reference ==

=== Ports & URLs ===
* **Frontend**: http://localhost:3000
* **API Gateway**: http://localhost:8000
* **Analytics API**: http://localhost:8002/docs
* **AI/ML Service**: http://localhost:8001/docs
* **Admin Dashboard**: http://localhost:8080
* **Grafana**: http://localhost:3001 (admin/admin)
* **Prometheus**: http://localhost:9090

=== System Requirements ===
* **CPU**: 4+ cores (8+ for production)
* **RAM**: 8GB+ (16GB+ for production)
* **Disk**: 100GB+ SSD (500GB+ for node)
* **Network**: 100Mbps+ stable connection

=== Performance Benchmarks ===
* **Rust blockchain-node**: ~1000 blocks/sec, ~5000 events/sec
* **FastAPI services**: ~5000 requests/sec
* **ML inference**: ~100 predictions/sec
* **Stream processing**: ~10000 events/sec
